# Blessed Book, Greater
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 13th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 20,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

This well-made tome is always of small size, typically no more than 12 inches tall, 8 inches wide, and 1 inch thick. All such books are durable, waterproof, bound with iron overlaid with silver, and locked.

A wizard can fill the 3,000 pages of a *greater blessed book* with spells without paying the material cost. This book is never found as randomly generated treasure with spells already inscribed in it.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Secret Page (Spell)|secret page]]*

**Cost** 10,000 gp

**Source:** The Mage's Tower
